text: herapy.    - Radiation therapy alone.    - Chemotherapy combined with radiation therapy and/or surgery.    - A clinical trial of new combinations of treatments.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage III non-small cell lung cancer. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location of the trial, the type of treatment, or the name of the drug. Talk with your doctor about clinical trial
